name: electroweb
effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stats.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stats.
